00038 void purify_measurement_fft_real(void *out, void *in, 
00039                                  void **data) {
00040 
00041   fftw_plan *plan;
00042   int iu, iv, ind, ind_half;
00043   int iu_neg, iv_neg, ind_neg;
00044   double complex *y, *y_half;
00045   purify_image *img;
00046 
00047   // Cast intput pointers.
00048   y = (double complex*)out;
00049   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00050   img = (purify_image*)data[1];
00051 
00052   // Allocate space for output of real-to-complex FFT before compute
00053   // full plane through conjugate symmetry.
00054   y_half = (complex double*)malloc(img->nx*img->ny*sizeof(complex double));
00055   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y_half);
00056 
00057   // Perform real-to-complex FFT.
00058   fftw_execute_dft_r2c(*plan, 
00059                        (double*)in, 
00060                        y_half);
00061 
00062   // Compute other half of complex plane through conjugate symmetry.
00063   for (iu = 0; iu < img->nx; iu++) {
00064     for (iv = 0; iv < img->ny/2+1; iv++) {
00065 
00066       ind_half = iu*(img->ny/2+1) + iv;
00067       purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind, iu, iv, 
00068                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00069 
00070       // Copy current data element.
00071       y[ind] = y_half[ind_half];
00072 
00073       // Compute reflected data through conjugate symmetry if
00074       // necessary.
00075       if (iu == 0 && iv == 0) {
00076         // Do nothing for DC component.
00077       } 
00078       else if (iu == 0) {
00079         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00080         iv_neg = img->ny - iv;
00081         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu, iv_neg, 
00082                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00083         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00084       }
00085       else if (iv == 0) {
00086         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00087         iu_neg = img->nx - iu;
00088         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu_neg, iv, 
00089                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00090         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00091       }
00092       else {
00093         // Reflect along diagonal.
00094         iv_neg = img->ny - iv;
00095         iu_neg = img->nx - iu;
00096         purify_visibility_iuiv2ind(&ind_neg, iu_neg, iv_neg, 
00097                                  img->nx, img->ny);
00098         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00099       }
00100     }
00101   }
00102   
00103   // Free temporary memory.
00104   free(y_half);
00105 
00106 }

00121 void purify_measurement_fft_complex(void *out, void *in, 
00122                                     void **data) {
00123 
00124   fftw_plan *plan;
00125 
00126   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00127   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, 
00128                    (complex double*)in, 
00129                    (complex double*)out);
00130 
00131 }

00197 void purify_measurement_opfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data) {
00198 
00199   fftw_plan *plan;
00200   purify_image *img;
00201   purify_sparsemat *mask;
00202 
00203   void *data_fft[2];
00204   void *data_mask[1];  
00205   double complex* vis_full;
00206 
00207   plan = (fftw_plan *)data[0];
00208   img = (purify_image *)data[1];
00209   mask = (purify_sparsemat*)data[2];
00210 
00211   vis_full = malloc(img->nx * img->ny * sizeof(double complex));
00212   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(vis_full);
00213 
00214   data_fft[0] = (void *)plan;
00215   data_fft[1] = (void *)img;
00216   purify_measurement_fft_real((void *)vis_full, in, data_fft);
00217 
00218   data_mask[0] = (void *)mask;
00219   purify_measurement_mask_opfwd(out, (void *)vis_full, data_mask);
00220 
00221   free(vis_full);
00222 
00223 }

00238 void purify_measurement_init_cft(purify_sparsemat_row *mat, 
00239                                  double *deconv, double *u, double *v, 
00240                                  purify_measurement_cparam *param) {
00241 
00242   int i, j, k, l;
00243   int nx2, ny2;
00244   double u1;
00245   double v1;
00246   int g1, g2, h1, h2;
00247   int  g11, h11;
00248   double temp1, temp2, sigmax, sigmay;
00249   int row, st, numel;
00250   
00251   double *u2;
00252   double *v2;
00253   double *u3;
00254   double *v3;
00255 
00256   double *kernel;
00257   int *ptr;
00258   
00259   //Sparse matrix initialization
00260   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00261   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00262 
00263   mat->nrows = param->nmeas;
00264   mat->ncols = nx2*ny2;
00265   mat->nvals = param->kx*param->ky*param->nmeas;
00266   mat->real = 1;
00267   mat->cvals = NULL;
00268   numel = param->kx*param->ky;
00269  
00270   
00271   mat->vals = (double*)malloc(mat->nvals * sizeof(double));
00272   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->vals);
00273   mat->colind = (int*)malloc(mat->nvals * sizeof(int));
00274   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->colind);
00275   mat->rowptr = (int*)malloc((mat->nrows + 1) * sizeof(int));
00276   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(mat->rowptr);
00277 
00278 
00279   //Discrete frequency grids
00280   u2 = (double*)malloc(nx2 * sizeof(double));
00281   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u2);
00282   v2 = (double*)malloc(ny2 * sizeof(double));
00283   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v2);
00284   u3 = (double*)malloc((nx2 + param->kx) * sizeof(double));
00285   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(u3);
00286   v3 = (double*)malloc((ny2 + param->ky) * sizeof(double));
00287   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(v3);
00288 
00289   
00290   temp1 = 2*PURIFY_PI/(double)nx2;
00291   u2[0] = 0.0;
00292   for (i=1; i < nx2; i++){
00293     u2[i] = u2[i-1] + temp1;
00294   }
00295   u3[0] = -((double)param->kx/2.0)*temp1;
00296   for (i=1; i < (nx2 + param->kx); i++){
00297     u3[i] = u3[i-1] + temp1;
00298   }
00299 
00300   temp1 = 2*PURIFY_PI/(double)ny2;
00301   v2[0] = 0.0;
00302   for (i=1; i < ny2; i++){
00303     v2[i] = v2[i-1] + temp1;
00304   }
00305   v3[0] = -((double)param->ky/2.0)*temp1;
00306   for (i=1; i < (ny2 + param->ky); i++){
00307     v3[i] = v3[i-1] + temp1;
00308   }
00309 
00310 
00311   //Allocate memory for the kernel
00312   kernel = (double*)malloc((numel) * sizeof(double));
00313   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(kernel);
00314 
00315   ptr = (int*)malloc((numel) * sizeof(int));
00316   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ptr);
00317 
00318 
00319   //Scale parameters for the Gaussian interpolation kernel
00320   sigmax = 1.0/(double)param->nx1;
00321   sigmay = 1.0/(double)param->ny1;
00322 
00323 
00324   //Main loop
00325   for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++){
00326     
00327     //Row pointer
00328     row = i*numel;
00329     
00330     //Shift by 2Pi for negative frecquencies (fftshift)
00331     if (u[i] < 0.0){
00332       u1 = u[i] + 2*PURIFY_PI;
00333     }
00334     else{
00335       u1 = u[i];
00336     }
00337 
00338     if (v[i] < 0.0){
00339       v1 = v[i] + 2*PURIFY_PI;
00340     }
00341     else{
00342       v1 = v[i];
00343     }
00344     
00345     //Find closest point in the discrete grid
00346     g1 = purify_utils_absearch(u2, nx2, u1);
00347     h1 = purify_utils_absearch(v2, ny2, v1);
00348 
00349     
00350     //Pointers in u2 and v2
00351     g2 = g1 + (param->kx/2);
00352     g1 = g1 - (param->kx/2) + 1;
00353     h2 = h1 + (param->ky/2);
00354     h1 = h1 - (param->ky/2) + 1;
00355 
00356  
00357     //Pointers in u3 and v3
00358     g11 = g1 + (param->kx/2);
00359     h11 = h1 + (param->ky/2);
00360 
00361     
00362     //Interpolation kernel evaluated on the discrete grid
00363     for (k=0; k < param->kx; k++){
00364       temp1 = (u3[g11 + k] - u1)/sigmax;
00365       temp1 = temp1*temp1;
00366       st = k*param->ky;
00367       for (j=0; j < param->ky; j++){
00368         temp2 = (v3[h11 + j] - v1)/sigmay;
00369         temp2 = temp2*temp2;
00370         temp2 = -(temp1 + temp2)/2.0;
00371         kernel[j + st] = exp(temp2);
00372       }
00373     }
00374   
00375     //Foldings for the circular shifts
00376     if ((g1 < 0)&&(h1 < 0)){
00377       //Case 1
00378 
00379       h11 = ny2+h1;
00380       j = param->ky - ny2;
00381       // 1 and 2
00382       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00383         st = l*param->ky;
00384         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00385         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00386           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00387           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00388         }
00389         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00390           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00391           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00392         }
00393       }
00394       
00395       // 3 and 4
00396       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00397         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00398         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00399         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00400           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00401           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + g11];
00402         }
00403         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00404           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00405           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00406         }
00407       }
00408 
00409       //Column pointer vector
00410       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00411         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00412       }
00413 
00414     }  
00415     else if ((g1 < 0)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00416       //Case 2
00417 
00418       //2
00419       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00420         st = l*param->ky;
00421         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00422         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00423           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00424           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00425         }
00426       }
00427       
00428       //1
00429       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00430         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00431         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00432         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00433           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00434           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00435         }
00436       }
00437 
00438       //Column pointer vector
00439       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00440         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00441       }
00442 
00443     } 
00444     else if ((g1 < 0)&&(h2 >= ny2)){
00445       //Case 3
00446 
00447       h11 = ny2-h1;
00448       j = param->ky - ny2;
00449       // 1 and 2
00450       for (l = 0; l <= g2; l++){
00451         st = l*param->ky;
00452         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00453         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00454           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00455           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00456         }
00457         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00458           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00459           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00460         }
00461       }
00462       
00463       // 3 and 4
00464       for (l = nx2+g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00465         st = (l+param->kx-nx2)*param->ky;
00466         g11 = (l-nx2-g1)*param->ky;
00467         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00468           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00469           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00470         }
00471         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00472           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00473           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00474         }
00475       }

00477       //Column pointer vector
00478       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00479         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00480       }
00481 
00482     } 
00483     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h1 < 0)){
00484       //Case 4
00485       h11 = ny2+h1;
00486       j = param->ky - ny2;
00487  
00488       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00489         st = (l - g1)*param->ky;
00490         //2
00491         for (k = 0; k <= h2; k++){
00492           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00493           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + st];
00494           
00495         }
00496         //1
00497         for (k = h11; k <= ny2-1; k++){
00498           ptr[k + j + st] = k + l*ny2;
00499           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h11 + st];
00500         }
00501       }
00502 
00503       //Column pointer vector
00504       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00505         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00506       }
00507 
00508     }
00509     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00510       //Case 5
00511 
00512       j = 0;
00513       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00514         st = l*ny2;
00515         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00516           ptr[j] = k + st;
00517           j++;
00518         }
00519       }
00520       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00521         mat->vals[j + row] = kernel[j];
00522         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00523       }
00524 
00525     }
00526     else if ((g1 >= 0)&&(g2 < nx2)&&(h2 >= ny2)){
00527       //Case 6
00528 
00529       h11 = ny2-h1;
00530       j = param->ky - ny2;
00531       
00532       for (l = g1; l <= g2; l++){
00533         st = (l - g1)*param->ky;
00534         //2
00535         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00536           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00537           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + st];
00538         }

00542           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + st];
00543         }
00544       }
00545

00548         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00549       }
00550 
00551     }  
00552     else if ((g2 >= nx2)&&(h1 < 0)){
00553       //Case 7
00554 
00555       h11 = ny2+h1;
00556       j = param->ky - ny2;
00557       // 1 and 2
00558       for (l = 0; l <= param->kx-nx2+g1-1; l++){

00560         g11 = (l+nx2-g1)*param->ky;

00590     }  
00591     else if ((g2 >= nx2)&&(h1 >= 0)&&(h2 < ny2)){
00592       //Case 8
00593 
00594       //2

00598         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){
00599           ptr[k - h1 + st] = k + l*ny2;
00600           mat->vals[k - h1 + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00601         }
00602       }
00603 
00604       //1
00605       for (l = g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00606         st = (l + param->kx - nx2)*param->ky;
00607         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00608         for (k = h1; k <= h2; k++){

00621       //Case 9
00622

00624       j = param->ky - ny2;
00625       // 1 and 2

00636         }
00637       }
00638

00640       for (l = g1; l <= nx2-1; l++){
00641         st = (l + param->kx - nx2)*param->ky;
00642         g11 = (l-g1)*param->ky;
00643         for (k = h1; k <= ny2-1; k++){

00645           mat->vals[k + j + st + row] = kernel[k - h1 + g11];
00646         }
00647         for (k = 0; k <= h2-ny2; k++){
00648           ptr[k + st] = k + l*ny2;
00649           mat->vals[k + st + row] = kernel[k + h11 + g11];
00650         }
00651       }
00652 
00653       //Column pointer vector
00654       for (j = 0; j < numel; j++){
00655         mat->colind[j + row] = ptr[j];
00656       }
00657 
00658     }
00659         
00660   }
00661 
00662   //Row pointer vector
00663   for (j = 0; j < mat->nrows + 1; j++){
00664     mat->rowptr[j] = j*numel;
00665   }
00666 
00667   //Deconvolution kernel in image domain
00668    
00669   u2[0] = -(double)param->nx1/2;
00670   for (i=1; i < param->nx1; i++){
00671     u2[i] = u2[i-1] + 1.0;
00672   }
00673  
00674   v2[0] = -(double)param->ny1/2;
00675   for (i=1; i < param->ny1; i++){
00676     v2[i] = v2[i-1] + 1.0;
00677   }
00678  
00679   for (k=0; k < param->nx1; k++){
00680     temp1 = u3[k]*sigmax;
00681     temp1 = temp1*temp1;
00682     st = k*param->ny1;
00683     for (j=0; j < param->ny1; j++){
00684       temp2 = v3[j]*sigmay;
00685       temp2 = temp2*temp2;
00686       temp2 = -(temp1 + temp2)/2.0;
00687       deconv[j + st] = 1.0/exp(temp2);
00688     }
00689   }
00690 
00691   //Free temporal memory
00692   free(u2);
00693   free(v2);
00694   free(u3);
00695   free(v3);
00696   free(kernel);
00697   free(ptr);
00698 
00699 }
00700 
00722 void purify_measurement_cftfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00723 
00724   int i, j, nx2, ny2;
00725   int st1, st2;
00726   double scale;
00727   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00728   double *deconv;
00729   purify_sparsemat_row *mat;
00730   fftw_plan *plan;
00731   complex double *temp;
00732   complex double *xin;
00733   complex double *yout;
00734   complex double alpha;
00735 
00736   //Cast input pointers
00737   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00738   deconv = (double*)data[1];
00739   mat = (purify_sparsemat_row*)data[2];
00740   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[3];
00741   temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00742 
00743   xin = (complex double*)in;
00744   yout = (complex double*)out;
00745 
00746   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00747   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00748   
00749   alpha = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00750   //Zero padding and decovoluntion. 
00751   //Left top corner of thee image corresponf to the original image.
00752   for (i=0; i < nx2*ny2; i++){
00753     *(temp + i) = alpha;
00754   }
00755 
00756   //Scaling
00757   scale = 1/sqrt((double)(nx2*ny2));
00758 
00759   for (j=0; j < param->nx1; j++){
00760     st1 = j*param->ny1;
00761     st2 = j*ny2;
00762     for (i=0; i < param->ny1; i++){
00763       *(temp + st2 + i) = *(xin + st1 + i)**(deconv + st1 + i)*scale;
00764     }
00765   }
00766 
00767   //FFT
00768   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, temp, temp);
00769 
00770   //Multiplication by the sparse matrix storing the interpolation kernel
00771   purify_sparsemat_fwd_complexr(yout, temp, mat);
00772 
00773 }
00774 
00796 void purify_measurement_cftadj(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00797 
00798   int i, j, nx2, ny2;
00799   int st1, st2;
00800   double scale;
00801   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00802   double *deconv;
00803   purify_sparsemat_row *mat;
00804   fftw_plan *plan;
00805   complex double *temp;
00806   complex double *yin;
00807   complex double *xout;
00808 
00809   //Cast input pointers
00810   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00811   deconv = (double*)data[1];
00812   mat = (purify_sparsemat_row*)data[2];
00813   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[3];
00814   temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00815 
00816   yin = (complex double*)in;
00817   xout = (complex double*)out;
00818 
00819   nx2 = param->ofx*param->nx1;
00820   ny2 = param->ofy*param->ny1;
00821 
00822   //Multiplication by the adjoint of the 
00823   //sparse matrix storing the interpolation kernel
00824   purify_sparsemat_adj_complexr(temp, yin, mat);
00825 
00826   //Inverse FFT
00827   fftw_execute_dft(*plan, temp, temp);
00828   //Scaling
00829   scale = 1/sqrt((double)(nx2*ny2));
00830   
00831   //Cropping and decovoluntion. 
00832   //Top left corner of the image corresponf to the original image.
00833 
00834   for (j=0; j < param->nx1; j++){
00835     st1 = j*param->ny1;
00836     st2 = j*ny2;
00837     for (i=0; i < param->ny1; i++){
00838       *(xout + st1 + i) = *(temp + st2 + i)**(deconv + st1 + i)*scale;
00839     }
00840   }
00841 
00842 }
00843 
00856 double purify_measurement_pow_meth(void (*A)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00857                                    void **A_data,
00858                                    void (*At)(void *out, void *in, void **data), 
00859                                    void **At_data) {
00860 
00861   int i, iter, nx, ny;
00862   int seedn = 51;
00863   double bound, norm, rel_ob;
00864   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00865   complex double *y;
00866   complex double *x;
00867 
00868   
00869   //Cast input pointers
00870   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)A_data[0];
00871   nx = param->nx1*param->ny1;
00872   ny = param->nmeas;
00873   iter = 0;
00874 
00875   y = (complex double*)malloc((ny) * sizeof( complex double));
00876   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);
00877   x = (complex double*)malloc((nx) * sizeof( complex double));
00878   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(x);
00879 
00880   if (param->nmeas > nx){
00881     for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00882         x[i] = purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I;
00883     }
00884     norm = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)x, 1);
00885     for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00886         x[i] = x[i]/norm;
00887     }
00888     norm = 1.0;
00889 
00890     //main loop
00891     while (iter < 200){
00892       A((void*)y, (void*)x, A_data);
00893       At((void*)x, (void*)y, At_data);
00894       bound = cblas_dznrm2(nx, (void*)x, 1);
00895       rel_ob = (bound - norm)/norm;
00896       if (rel_ob <= 0.001)
00897         break;
00898       norm = bound;
00899       for (i=0; i < nx; i++) {
00900           x[i] = x[i]/norm;
00901       }
00902       iter++;
00903     }
00904 
00905   }
00906   else{
00907     for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00908         y[i] = purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + purify_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I;
00909     }
00910     norm = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)y, 1);
00911     for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00912         y[i] = y[i]/norm;
00913     }
00914     norm = 1.0;
00915 
00916     //main loop
00917     while (iter < 200){
00918       At((void*)x, (void*)y, At_data);
00919       A((void*)y, (void*)x, A_data);
00920       bound = cblas_dznrm2(ny, (void*)y, 1);
00921       rel_ob = (bound - norm)/norm;
00922       if (rel_ob <= 0.001)
00923         break;
00924       norm = bound;
00925       for (i=0; i < ny; i++) {
00926           y[i] = y[i]/norm;
00927       }
00928       iter++;
00929     }
00930 
00931   }
00932 
00933   free(y);
00934   free(x);
00935 
00936   return bound;
00937 
00938 }
00939 
00963 void purify_measurement_symcftfwd(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00964 
00965   int i, ny;
00966   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
00967   complex double *yout;
00968 
00969   purify_measurement_cftfwd(out, in, data);
00970 
00971   //Cast input pointers
00972   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
00973   yout = (complex double*)out;
00974   ny = param->nmeas;
00975  
00976    
00977   //Take real part and multiply by two.
00978 
00979   for (i=0; i < ny; i++){
00980     yout[i + ny] = conj(yout[i]);
00981     
00982   }
00983 
00984 }
00985 
01009 void purify_measurement_symcftadj(void *out, void *in, void **data){
01010 
01011   int i, nx;
01012   purify_measurement_cparam *param;
01013   complex double *xout;
01014 
01015   purify_measurement_cftadj(out, in, data);
01016 
01017   //Cast input pointers
01018   param = (purify_measurement_cparam*)data[0];
01019   xout = (complex double*)out;
01020   nx = param->nx1*param->ny1;
01021  
01022    
01023   //Take real part and multiply by two.
01024 
01025   for (i=0; i < nx; i++){
01026     xout[i] = 2*creal(xout[i]) + 0.0*I;
01027     
01028   }
01029 
01030 }
